Package model

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
model.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Object
This class represents an enemy in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, int typeNumber, int subtractedScore, int addedScore, int positionX, int positionY)
      Constructor
      This method is the constructor of the class Enemy.
      pre: The parameters must be initialized.
      post: A new object of the class Enemy has been created.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the enemy.
      typeNumber - A number that represents the type of the enemy.
      subtractedScore - score subtracted by the enemy.
      addedScore - score added by the enemy.
      positionX - position x of the enemy.
      positionY - position y of the enemy.
